item.title: Golang Basics: Feeling Go
item.description: First blog in the Golang Basics series, covering concepts of Variables, Values and Types in Golang

item.title: Golang Basics - Syllabus
item.description: Revisiting my GoLang basics, covering almost all topics, and documenting them here as a blog series for others to learn GoLang

item.title: CpuRoller
item.description: Simple Cross Platform Desktop application for seeing your CPU and RAM utilization with an intuitive design. Available natively on Windows, Linux and MacOS.
